title: To Boycott Or To Not Boycott
itunes:title: To Boycott Or To Not Boycott
description:
Today on the show, we had Vic Mensa stop by to promote his new album, Jay- Z and more. Also, after the backlash we received from the Lil Duval interview about trans woman and trans men, we opened up the phone lines to see how our listeners really felt, and lets just say our listeners have some common sense. Moreover, Charlamagne gave “Donkey of the Day" to Tomi Lahren because she is on Obamacare after speaking down upon it

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show, we had Vic Mensa stop by to promote his new album, Jay- Z and more. Also, after the backlash we received from the Lil Duval interview about trans woman and trans men, we opened up the phone lines to see how our listeners really felt, and lets just say our listeners have some common sense. Moreover, Charlamagne gave “Donkey of the Day" to Tomi Lahren because she is on Obamacare after speaking down upon it
